title: Hero MotoCorp plans to roll out affordable EVs this fiscal
description: Hero MotoCorp aims to lead the electric two-wheeler market by launching affordable models this fiscal year, as CEO Niranjan Gupta outlined in the company's Annual Report for 2023-24. Gupta emphasized Hero's strategy to expand its electric vehicle (EV) portfolio aggressively, building on the success of the VIDA V1 Pro scooter.
